scripts.build: set -e && echo 'Downloading Flutter 3.35.4...' && curl -fsSL https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.35.4-stable.tar.xz | tar -xJ && export PATH="$PWD/flutter/bin:$PATH" && cd flutter && git config --global --add safe.directory $PWD && git fetch --unshallow || true && cd .. && echo 'Flutter version:' && flutter --version && echo 'Enabling web support...' && flutter config --enable-web && echo 'Getting dependencies...' && flutter pub get && echo 'Building web app...' && flutter build web --release --base-href / && echo 'Build completed. Directory structure:' && ls -la && echo 'Contents of build directory:' && ls -la build/ && echo 'Contents of build/web directory:' && ls -la build/web/
